1664330.name: Blade's Legacy Demo
1664330.description:
Many years ago, a brave hero defeated Rorudark, an evil wizard that tried to destroy the world. Rorudark was trapped in the depths of the world, but centuries later his anger and extreme power set him free, and how revenge Rorudark cursed all the animals and creatures in the world, which are now attacking people. Now our last hope is you, who carry the Blade's Legacy. Now go, defeat your enemies and Rorudark, and save the world!

Dive into the thrilling demo of Blade's Legacy! Experience the full adventure of World 1, mastering 10 dynamic levels packed with exploration, intense enemy battles, and agile platforming. Jump, climb, and crouch your way through challenges, honing your skills in this action-packed journey. Start your epic quest now!

This demo includes:

- 10 different levels in world 1!

- 3 items to be purchased in the shop!

- 2 enemies!

- Lots of obstacles, platforms, traps and challenges!

- An incredible and complete soundtrack, with awesome musics and sounds!

- An automated game saving system!

- A medium difficulty, fun and challenging to play!
1664330.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
